thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com
thread.title: kittenpawsbb

author: kittenpawsbb
title: kittenpawsbb
text: Before I shop I check Topcashback for any extra savings. I may find the same item from two online stores and select which offers the highest percentage back. I can easily find my history from a my purchases. Plus in months I haven't shopped and my rewards weren't taken away. I also like the pay-out options, where I can get a bonus percentage added, depending on my selection. Highly recommend!
